articles.description: Honestly proving why they deserved lifetime-achievement awards.
articles.content: Jennifer Lopez and Bethenny Frankel gave effusive and varied performances as human women accepting awards at the MTV Movie & TV Awards on June 5. Famed nude lipwearer J.Lo won the Generation Awar… [+1703 chars]

articles.description: Along with six other epic looks.
articles.content: Vanessa Hudgens took her MTV Movie and TV Awards hosting gig seriously and, as any good host knows, with that comes several outfit changes. The actress-singer extraordinaire did not disappoint on the… [+1563 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Hunger Games prequel, The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes: first teaser - Polygon
articles.description: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes — based on Suzanne Collin’s Hunger Games prequel novel — will hit theaters in Nov 2023. Starring Tom Blyth and Rachel Zelger. Check out the first teaser.
articles.content: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes hits theaters next November
